attributes.action: Make hospitals offer face to face appointments, or face panalties.
attributes.additional_details: People are dying, or diagnoses are missed leading to worsening levels of illness.
attributes.background: Make the medical profession do what they are supposed to do or face stringent penalties.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
